errors.title: Error
errors.insufficientPermissions: You don't have permission to perform this action
errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please login again
errors.maintenanceMode: The system is under maintenance. Please try again later
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please try again later
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred in the application.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved or deleted.
notFound.contactSupport: If you believe this is a mistake, please contact support.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
serverError.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support.

networkError.title: Network Error
networkError.description: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
networkError.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support.

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.description: We're currently performing scheduled maintenance to improve your experience.
maintenance.contactSupport: For more information, please contact support.
maintenance.apology: We apologize for any inconvenience. We'll be back online shortly.

networkError.tip1: Check your Wi-Fi or mobile data connection
networkError.tip2: Try disabling VPN if you're using one
networkError.tip3: Clear your browser cache and cookies
networkError.tip4: Contact support if the problem persists
